EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 160 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Michael, I wanted to follow up on our call and provide you with some helpful resources to get your consulting work off the ground. You may find some of the resources we developed specifically for independent consultants helpful: · The Independent’s Guide <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8ygZaFe6Uco5P2vZSBkKzSy%2DxjqTOKZhHdekjmsR567qkhU0xi4mEunLVMB0CS0FYZx6zUac0vQrrI5EUblq9zl7WDLMWhAU8tKkr4qv6RIDkq0mXzBXq2x%2DDG2ZY8O6v00WFOLx9tPMC7Gwp3QAKSePuzQ3fz78o8DILzcJ9j046%5FcZHAt1R7UqeZxzJtI31efFtW%2DC4krCj5P56WRc2gdQdSVreLm%2DGJbqxXwB58h2%2Dgw8AGyFHB20HVKlo1A%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyAPni198710x7fPjcdUb6gddUU80%5Fbv2hFQ0bTsJ59S1zIOq2f7ZU%2DOBWBxLnXhDIobDIZoZEc5Zy5dts66qpyFlQ%2DPCXuWr5GlYndVZFZQqobvpzoHi0FA%2C%2C>· <http://link.mbopartners.com/ol/0xEFfZmddHNcoUZ1%5Fu%2DNb%5Fmgz3iQN8jlq65yDbq2lMIt3kF6L7yJPEjr1YIDT8Z0dufDUUQVGpQ8ygZaFe6Uco5P2vZSBkKzSy%2DxjqTOKZhHdekjmsR567qkhU0xi4mEunLVMB0CS0FYZx6zUac0vQrrI5EUblq9zl7WDLMWhAU8tKkr4qv6RIDkq0mXzBXq2x%2DDG2ZY8O6v00WFOLx9tPMC7Gwp3QAKSePuzQ3fz78o8DILzcJ9j046%5FcZHAt1R7UqeZxzJtI31efFtW%2DC4krCj5P56WRc2gdQdSVreLm%2DGJbqxXwB58h2%2Dgw8AGyFHB20HVKlo1A%2C%2C/1gwVMM7QNEZOogl76fOJI7v5kTDSadartLEyAPni198710x7fPiCO07hm8ZdCJs8YqScEwsVFc9syxhnDu%2DeIdJYz9R2MUuRWw3rgrTRY94bd59E%5FdBz9qOv2kIEk8ePhl7AGXZbElx5TzCoeqYJsRrOMZwWWEbU3j6SEQ%2C%2C> I would also recommend that you check our www.zintro.com <http://www.zintro.com> and www.workmarket.com <http://www.workmarket.com> which are job boards geared toward individuals like yourself. You’ll find more SME contracts on Zintro. Please let me know if you have any questions on the enclosed materials. Happy Holidays,Emily ___________________________________Emily StringerConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6282f: 703.793.6457e: estringer@mbopartners.com <estringer@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
